body.bibl: Kiraz, George Anton. “Garshunography: Terminology and Some Formal Properties of Writing One Language in the Script of Another.” In Scripts Beyond Borders: A Survey of Allographic Traditions in the Euro-Mediterranean World, edited by Johannes den Heijer, Andrea B.
